ALLERGY NOTICE
All of our food is house smoked and homemade. All ingredients may have come into contact with nuts, dairy and gluten. Please where possible we will accommodate dietary restrictions.

VG = Vegetarian GF = Can be Modified Gluten Free
GF* = Gluten Friendly
